wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Paget Mellor, 1st Baronet  (13 March 1862 – 4 February 1929) was an English lawyer and  U.K. Treasury Solicitor. He was a talented amateur artist who contributed caricatures to Vanity Fair as Quiz.

response: * Sir John Mellor, 1st Baronet (1862–1929), English lawyer and Treasury Solicitor
